cli_content:
Server: 192.168.1.1
Address: 192.168.1.1#53

Non-authoritative answer:
Name:    example.com
Address: 93.184.216.34

Server: 8.8.8.8
Address: 8.8.8.8#53

Non-authoritative answer:
Name:    example.org
Address: 93.184.216.35

Server: 4.4.4.4
Address: 4.4.4.4#53

Non-authoritative answer:
Name:    example.net
Address: 93.184.216.36
textfsm_template:
Value SERVER_IP (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value SERVER_ADDRESS (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+\#\d+)
Value NAME (\S+)
Value ANSWER_ADDRESS (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)

Start
  ^Server:\s+${SERVER_IP} -> ServerSection

ServerSection
  ^Address:\s+${SERVER_ADDRESS}
  ^Non-authoritative\s+answer:$$
  ^Name:\s+${NAME}
  ^Address:\s+${ANSWER_ADDRESS} -> Record
